column5: Got up early and went fishing for the morning  Jaydub came too.  Very busy and a good day.  I finished with 17 smallies and Jaydub caught 8. Biggest fish was my first smallie of the day and weighed 4.01 pounds.  7 mins later I tangle with a 3.5 pounder.  After that, no real big fish but very fun.  Water was so clear I literally saw 40-50 bass this morn  Pic of Jaydub's fish   Pic of little fish but cool tshirt   3.5 pounder  4.01 pounds
Great crop of smallies there for sure. Water looks like it couldn't get much calmer except for some places near shore. Thanks for the pics.
Nice bass, what happened to your lemur tail beard?
Nice going those are some nice smallies.
lol! Lemur tail only stayed on for 3 days (despite my youngest daughter's pleas to keep it on forever)

It was a beautiful day out there.  I was out downrigging till our motor started to act up, then went for bass.  We saw a few, one had to have been over 5.  But could get any to bite.. Managed a few perch, and that was it.  Looks like you guys had a great Canada day.  The launch must have been a nightmare..

launched at 5:15 am nobody there.  Left my boat at a friend's house on the water so did not have to take it out.  GOing to get boat now. I dropped Jaydub off at the launch around noon and it was insane.  Glad I did not have to deal with it.
Nice fish Chris and that spot is awesome.
absolutely nice fish man  but what happen to the beard??? lolz
I need to get out there for some topwater action before the sun comes up!!!
